sources.title: Sentence-BERT: Sentence Embeddings using Siamese BERT-Networks
sources.synthesis: Sentence-BERT with cross-encoder fine-tuning enables efficient semantic ranking of document pairs for retrieval augmentation. Cross-encoders score relevance between queries and documents with 2-3% F1 improvement over bi-encoders.

sources.title: Improving Document Ranking with Cross-Encoder Reranking
sources.synthesis: Cross-Encoder re-rankers achieve 8-15% nDCG improvement on MS MARCO when combined with BM25 or neural retrieval. Two-stage ranking (retrieve then cross-encode) is efficient with <200ms latency for top-100 documents.
sources.relevance: Performance benchmarks and latency targets for Phase 3 re-ranking

sources.title: Bayesian Approaches to Deep Learning
sources.publication: University of Cambridge PhD Thesis (2016), expanded NIPS tutorial (2017)
sources.synthesis: Bayesian neural networks and posterior inference for uncertainty quantification. Variational inference enables scalable posterior estimation on model outputs; beta-binomial conjugate priors suitable for confidence aggregation from multiple evidence sources.
sources.relevance: Theoretical foundation for Bayesian confidence scoring in Phase 3

secondary_sources.title: Redis: An In-Memory Data Structure Store
secondary_sources.synthesis: Redis provides sub-millisecond latency for caching with TTL support. Pub/Sub and Lua scripting enable atomic multi-key operations for consistency.

secondary_sources.title: Comparative Analysis Patterns in Information Retrieval
secondary_sources.synthesis: Multi-document comparison tasks require entity alignment, attribute extraction, and contrastive summarization. Key-value pairs and tabular formats support readability.
